subject: Re: Reminder: Order #SSN4271, how did it go?
description_text:
How should i review it, when i havent Test IT because the Pedals are
Missing??
After it i can write a review.

SIMSONN <no-reply@loox.io> schrieb am Di., 23. Dez. 2025, 19:18:

> Hello Steffen, We would be grateful if you shared how things look and
> feel. Your review helps us and the community that supports us, and it only
> takes a few
